channel.title: Classic Re-Opened Once again!
channel.description: Finally jagex had re-opened classic to the public again, anyone planning to get on?

item.title: Classic Re-Opened Once again!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:33, topic:414841”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=516801.msg3753357#msg3753357 date=1316223671]
I played it for 20 mins, then the non free camera angles hurt my head and I logged out.
[/quote]
you can adjust it to free in the options.[/quote]
Ohhhhh, thx mate Im going back. =D

Read full topic

item.title: Classic Re-Opened Once again!
item.dc:creator: @noobicus noobicus
item.description:
@noobicus wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:42, topic:414841”][quote author=noobicus link=topic=516801.msg3753519#msg3753519 date=1316231178]

Luckily, i got on classic on my acc the last classic opening, so i dont have to worry about getting it this time

They said this is the last time they are opening classic right?

Sadly. It sucks because then people won’t know what a great game it used to be (content wise).
With minecraft, you can play classic, to see what the game once was.
Now JaGeX isn’t giving a shit about it’s original game, yet people aren’t complaining, when they should be.

Yeah… they are just using this as some money… well they are in a way… they want rs2 (2004-2006) to come back… its not the actual “Classic”, but tbh compared to today its classic :P, If they open a rs2, that would be awesome, even if its only open so you can join with your account like in rsc… if they want to make money… they should do that. Or, people who have had their acc before 06, should be able to play it either way (Like rsc, if im correct.)

I consider anything past 2008 to be rs3

I thought it was called RSHD :o
[/quote]
Same shit. RsBluRay is predicted December of 2012.[/quote]
lol
Then rs 3d

Dem korac spex look like they are shocking you :o

Read full topic
